strings: <voice_0x010011FF><se_low>Dominico: Ah, there you are. I hope that little scene before didn't upset you. It's nothing unusual.
<voice_0x01001200><se_low>Dominico: I don't know why, but just looking at David's face makes my blood boil.

<voice_0x01001201><se_low>Dominico: Of course, I'd never dream of firing him.
I have far too much fun being his master!
Ha ha ha!

<voice_0x01001202><se_low>Dominico: But enough of that! Have you got the jewels?
Have you brought me the Kran Spinels?
<voice_0x01001203><se_low>Dominico: Then what on earth are you doing back here!?
<voice_0x01001204><se_low>Dominico: Get out of here now! And don't come back until you've got them!
<voice_0x01001206><se_low>Dominico: Ah-ha! You have!

<voice_0x01001207><se_low>Dominico: I won't have you bore me with details.
I only care about results!
<Cap><hero> hands the Kran Spinels to Dominico.
Yangus hands the Kran Spinels to Dominico.
Jessica hands the Kran Spinels to Dominico.
Angelo hands the Kran Spinels to Dominico.
<Cap><leader> takes the Kran Spinels from <hero>'s coffin and hands them to Dominico.
<Cap><leader> takes the Kran Spinels from Yangus's coffin and hands them to Dominico.
<Cap><leader> takes the Kran Spinels from Jessica's coffin and hands them to Dominico.
<Cap><leader> takes the Kran Spinels from Angelo's coffin and hands them to Dominico.
<voice_0x01001208><se_low>Dominico: Yes! Just holding them in my hands, I can feel the waves of magical energy flowing out of them! Yes, the Kran Spinels!
<voice_0x01001209><se_low>Dominico: Making an impenetrable barrier will be simplicity itself with these! That wand-waving bimbo won't stand a chance!
<voice_0x0100120A><se_low>Dominico: And I expect you're feeling rather pleased with yourself! Helping the Great Dominico is an honour, is it not!?

<voice_0x0100120B><se_low>Dominico: So! Let me reward you! You may serve me as a guard until that meddling girl comes back.
I presume you accept this honour?
<voice_0x0100120C><se_low>Dominico: Ha ha ha ha hah! There's no need to be diffident! I'm sure you'll do!
<voice_0x0100120D><se_low>Dominico: Very good! From this moment on, you will be my bodyguards. And now for the first task in your new post!
<voice_0x0100120E><se_low>Dominico: Come this way.

<voice_0x0100120F><se_low>Dominico: This leads to my secret library.
You will find a book for me in there.

<voice_0x01001210><se_low>Dominico: The book is called ‘The Big Book of Barriers’.
It contains a recipe for making a very powerful barrier.
